name: 10 seconds classics
description:
Discover again the old video game classics. But it goes super fast!

Game made for the GDL Game Jam (may be quite buggy).

Made by Thomas Ferrand, Pierre Giraud, Cyril Li and Axel Poulat.

Music by Komiku: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_

Special thanks to TaupeHardie!
